title: Net sales share of Estée Lauder worldwide 2017 , by distribution channel
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net sales share for 8 number of Distribution channels.
The maximum Net sales share 42.0 is found at Distribution channel Department stores and the minimum is found at Salon and spa where Net sales share is 3.0.
The maximum Distribution channel Department stores has got 14.0 times higher Net sales share than the minimum Distribution channel Salon and spa.
min_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Distribution channel, and Net sales share in each Distribution channel on the y axis.
The Net sales share is appeared to be the highest at Distribution channel Department stores and lowest at Distribution channel Salon and spa.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net sales share for 8 number of Distribution channels.
The maximum Net sales share 42.0 is found at Distribution channel Department stores and the minimum is found at Salon and spa where Net sales share is 3.0.
The maximum Distribution channel Department stores has got 14.0 times higher Net sales share than the minimum Distribution channel Salon and spa.
max_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Distribution channel, and Net sales share in each Distribution channel on the y axis.
The Net sales share is appeared to be the highest at Distribution channel Department stores and lowest at Distribution channel Salon and spa.
Second maximum Net sales share is found at Distribution channel .
The highest Distribution channel Department stores has 39.0 more Net sales share than the lowest Distribution channel Salon and spa.
Net sales share at Distribution channel Department stores is 42.0 , second place is  at 42.0, and thirdly is Specialty-multi at 11.0.
Distribution channel Freestanding retail stores, and Specialty-multi have a similar Net sales share that is 11.0.
The average Net sales share in all 8 Distribution channels is 12.5.
The Net sales share is 100.0 if we add up values of all Distribution channels.
